info.name: Copyleaks API Shared Collection
info.description:
This Postman collection provides a set of pre-configured requests for testing and interacting with the Copyleaks API. It includes endpoints for authentication, as well as both synchronous and asynchronous scan workflows.

Cross-language plagiarism detection identifies content that has been translated from one language to another, helping catch plagiarism attempts where text is copied and translated to avoid detection.

This document provides information about the languages supported by Copyleaks for cross-language scans. The Copyleaks AI Image Detection API provides advanced capabilities to detect whether an image is AI-generated or partially AI-generated. This API uses sophisticated AI models to analyze images and produce a mask that overlays the submitted image, indicating which parts are AI-generated and which are authentic.
